name: InstallYUNIQLCLI
description: Acquires a specific version of the YUNIQL CLI from the internet or the local cache and adds it to the PATH.
helpMarkDown: Acquires a specific version of the YUNIQL CLI from the internet or the local cache and adds it to the PATH.
author: Rodel E. Dagumampan

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of YUNIQL CLI to use. If omitted, the latest version of YUNIQL CLI is installed. Visit the [releases](https://github.com/rdagumampan/yuniql/releases) to get an appropriate version.
